1054640.name: The Tower of Worth
1054640.description:
The Tower was always there.
With all the worth and reputation.

To reach the top of the Tower.
You must prove your worth.

About the Game

You become one of the numerous challengers and You must overcome ordeals and competition to climb the highest point of the tower. Climb the Tower is only and essential way to prove your Worth in this world.


Reach the highest point of the Tower. The Tower will respect your Worth.

Features

  • Ego with various effects that changing by your action and choice.
  • Various weapons and their unique skill set.
  • Contract providing various challenges and Reward having a powerful effect.
  • Unique combat system only for the Tower of Worth.
  • Various enemies and special bosses.
  • Prove of Worth
  • Multi Ending

Alteration of Ego

In progress of the climbing of the tower, Your Ego will face numerous moments of alteration, your Ego is changing its Trait by your action and choice. And each Trait has its own special ability.


It's your choice whether you insist on your worthly ego or adapt to the changing ego. The Ego is unlocked permanently by clearing special conditions. Unlock the new Ego and become more powerful!

Various weapons and their unique skill set.

You start with one of the inherited weapons. Each weapon has unique four skills that set itself apart from other weapons. You can enhance your skills or steal other's skills by climbing the tower. Understand skills feature and make the most effective strategy!

Contract and Reward

By investing Worth, You can contract with the Tower. The Tower provides various challenging contract and if you complete this, you can obtain rewards having various powerful effects. But beware, the Failed contract never gives you any reward.

Numerous ordeals

In the Tower, Numerous Ordeals stand in your way. Someone for keeping his place, someone for bringing you to your knees, and Someone for proving his worth, they will be hostile to you. Each enemy uses its own unique skills and strategies. The fight is inevitable.

Prove of Worth

The Tower will observe you and score your Worth. Prove your Worth by perfect and reasonable action. The Tower will respect your Worth.
